mapper.sql: INVENTORYID, CREATETIME, INVENTORYTYPE, QTY, CONSIGNSOR, STATUS,CREATENAME
mapper.select:
select
from T_WMS_INVENTORY where INVENTORYTYPE=10
and createtime>=to_date(#{param.begdate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and createtime <= to_date(#{param.enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd')
mapper.insert:
insert into T_WMS_INVENTORY
INVENTORYID,
CREATETIME,
INVENTORYTYPE,
QTY,
CONSIGNSOR,
STATUS,
CREATEID,
CREATENAME,
S_WMS_INVENTORY.nextval,
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{inventorytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{consignsor,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update T_WMS_INVENTORY
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
INVENTORYTYPE = #{inventorytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CONSIGNSOR = #{consignsor,jdbcType=OTHER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where INVENTORYID = #{inventoryid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_WMS_INVENTORY set CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INVENTORYTYPE = #{inventorytype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CONSIGNSOR = #{consignsor,jdbcType=OTHER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where INVENTORYID = #{inventoryid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
